page.title: 02A SUBURB -BREIGHTMET
page.content: Breightmet formerly a hamlet on the outskirts of Bolton. The name is derived from the Old English meaning bright meadow. More recently iy is a residential area following extensive mining as shown by the number of capped mine shafts and the amount of undeveloped re claimed land. The stream forming the Borough boundary formerly used for {Textile Mills}which are now demolished or used for other things. In my back garden I have a spinning jenny tree quite a lot of flowers six rose bushes a berry tree a shed and a sandpit. My dad is called Cliff my mum is called Christine my little brother is called Simon. My dad is a vicar my brother goes to playgroup.David age 7.
